predicate.note: Frames file for 'profile' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: oddly intransitive
example.text: Energy Transportation retained Litigation Sciences, at a cost of several hundred thousand dollars, [0] [*T*-1] to poll, pre-try, profile and shadow.

example.name: passive
example.text: Her husband and older son -- a computer prodigy profiled [*] in The Wall Street Journal in 1981, when he was 13 -- run a software company with expected sales this year of $10 million.
